name: mailguard
description: Email prompt-injection mitigation plugin - enforces sanitization, provenance-aware tool gating, and approval-gated side effects for Gmail-triggered automation
author: dortort

endpoint.description: HTTP endpoint path for Gmail webhook ingress

webhookSecret.description: Shared secret for webhook authentication (must match OpenClaw hook token)

maxPayloadSize.description: Maximum allowed payload size in bytes (default: 1MB)

maxBodyLength.description: Maximum email body length after sanitization (default: 50KB)

riskThreshold.description: Risk score threshold for automatic quarantine (0-100)

enableMLClassifier.description: Enable optional ML-based risk classifier (requires model endpoint)

mlClassifierEndpoint.description: Endpoint for ML risk classification service

allowedSenderDomains.description: Domains treated as trusted sources (reduces risk score)

allowedRecipientDomains.description: Allowed recipient domains for outbound actions

approvalRequiredActions.description: Actions that require explicit operator approval

rateLimitPerSender.description: Maximum requests per sender per hour

auditLogPath.description: Path for audit log file (optional, defaults to OpenClaw log directory)

allowUnsafeExternalContent.description: DANGER: Allow unsanitized content for trusted internal sources only

enabled.description: Use Lobster workflows for approval gating

workflowTemplate.description: Lobster workflow template name for approvals

allowUnsafeExternalContent.warning: Enabling this option bypasses security sanitization. Only enable for fully trusted internal email sources.
allowUnsafeExternalContent.label: Allow Unsafe Content (DANGER)
